skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily motivation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Are you looking for that ray of energy to start your day on a positive note? We got you! Daily Motivation Skill is here to encourage and motivate you to get your day going like a good cup of coffee.

HOW TO USE:
Get started by saying "Alexa, open Daily Motivation" and Alexa will inspire you with a motivational quote.

STEPS TO SET ROUTINES:
To add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps:
1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" > Select Daily Motivation.
6. Choose Device to perform the routine > SAVE.
